snippet: Mocked and misunderstood by outsiders, and largely an afterthought even in the world of track and field, racewalking is a serious pursuit in many parts of Latin America.
abstract: Racewalking is sometimes mocked and misunderstood by outsiders, and is largely an afterthought even in the world of track and field, but the sport is a serious pursuit in many Latin American countries.
lead_paragraph: Mocked and misunderstood by outsiders, and largely an afterthought even in the world of track and field, racewalking is a serious pursuit in many parts of Latin America.

headline.seo: In Latin America, They’ll Be Watching Olympic Racewalking
headline.main: Olympic Racewalking Is More Than Just a Stroll
headline.print_headline: Ignored in America, Racewalking Is Revered to the South
